laba1.task2

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • laba1.task2.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Quadrangle, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class Shape is the superclass of classes representing different shapes.
    Author:
    Vasiliy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void print()
      Prints out coordinates of the current Shape.
      abstract void scale(double ratio)
      Scales the Shape in according to the specified ratio.
      abstract void shift(double xShift, double yShift)
      Shifts the Shape in according to the specified vector.

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public abstract void print()
        Prints out coordinates of the current Shape.

      • scale

        public abstract void scale(double ratio)
        Scales the Shape in according to the specified ratio.
        Parameters:
        ratio - the scale to be applied to this Shape.

      • shift

        public abstract void shift(double xShift,
                           double yShift)
        Shifts the Shape in according to the specified vector.
        Parameters:
        xShift - the X-Axis coordinate of the vector.
        yShift - the Y-Axis coordinate of the vector.
